About (CV)


I am a Postdoctoral researcher in ETS.

Currently working Few-shot Learning, Clustering, Fairness in machine learning and Semi supervised Learning.

Research interests: Unsupervised learning, Explainable AI, Domain adaptation, Optimization methods in learning, Graph Neural Network.


News

  • 2020-09-27: Research article on fairness in clustering accepted at AAAI ‘21: Read here.
  • 2020-09-27: Paper accepted at Neurips ‘20: Read here.
  • 2020-07-02: Successfully defended my PhD dissertation.
  • 2020-07-02: ECCV paper on metric learning got accepted as spotlight!. Check here.
  • 2020-06-01: ICML paper on few-shot learning got accepted. Check here.
  • 2018-09-05: NeurIPS paper got accepted as a spotlight. Read here.
